page.title: 18PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: This is a game called Stuck in the Mud.You can play with as many people as you like.First someone is on it. They chase you and once you have been touched you have to stay in the place where they touched you.You put your arms and legs apart.Someone will crawl half way under your legs.Once they have done that you wait till the person that is on it is quite a long way away.You can then run away as fast as you can.You do that all the time. In British Bulldog you have to line up on one side of the play ground.The person that is on it says,"British Bulldog one two three".We all have to run to the other side of the play ground.The one who is on it has to catch someone and say "British Bulldog one two three"Then the person who is caught has to be on it with the catcher.
